title: Macintosh Essentials - iTunes Mac OS 8 Patch - Shared by Smart
description:
Here&#039;s another great torrent for the rest of us.
Shared by Smart

Today:
The iTunes Mac OS 8 Patch.
This patch allows you to use iTunes 1.0 and 1.1 (with caution 2.0.4) under Mac OS 8.6.

An declaration:
-----------------------------------------------
iTunes exists in fact for Mac OS 9 and Mac OS X.
Any version for Mac OS X - and iTunes 1.0, 1.1 and 2.0.4 for Mac OS 9 where Apple has dropped the iTunes support under the classic system.

Normally Mac OS 9.0.4 ist the lowest Mac OS that can run iTunes.

With this patch either the installed iTunes application from Mac OS 9 can be modified or the installer of iTunes itself.

That&#039;s it.
Just run the patch and let iTunes organize your music within Mac OS 8.6.

You are satisfied, do you ? :-D


Experiments ...
-----------------------------------------------
I&#039;ve figured out, that the reason, why iTunes (1.0, 1.1 or 2.0.4) don&#039;t run on Mac OS earlier than 8.6 (on 8.5 e.g.) some extensions are, wich comes with Mac OS 8.6.
So, the solution is easy:
=========================

Patch and install iTunes on Mac OS 8.6 and move all related files (the iTunes application, its extensions etc. - take a look at the install protocol located in the folder &#039;Install Protocols&#039; within the folder &#039;Documents&#039;) to your Mac OS 8.5 system.

Important:
Copy also the &#039;iTunes&#039; folder within the folder &#039;Documents&#039;.
iTunes won&#039;t start and denies function if an folder called &#039;iTunes&#039; (located in the &#039;Documents&#039; folder) doesn&#039;t exists - even if all requiered extensions still avaible.
If the folder &#039;iTunes&#039; (within the folder &#039;Documents&#039;) still contains anything doesn&#039;t matter.
There will be only verified if the folder exists.

Copy further the extensions &#039;Appeareance Extension&#039;, &#039;SystemAV&#039;, &#039;Monitor Plug-In&#039;, &#039;SMO Objects&#039;, &#039;NSL UI Library&#039; and &#039;Sound Manager&#039; from Mac OS 8.6 to your Mac OS 8.5 system.
Now you can still use iTunes on Mac OS 8.5.

The phantastic hint:
These procedure works also on Mac OS 8.0 and 8.1 ! :-)

Great, isn&#039;t it ? 


Tested and proved. It works.
I hope you enjoy these great application.

Just get what you want.
Enjoy and comment ! ;-)


At last like always:
--------------------
No adware !
No dialer !
No programs that phoning home !
No keyed content !
No stuff that you must buy to get what you want !


Always clear and great.

Just Smart-Torrent !
